meanings.sent1: The triune nature of the cloverleaf interchange impressed the engineers.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a triune picture with three different colors blending seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The triune flavors of the ice cream cone made it a delightful treat.
meanings.sent4: Her triune talents in singing, dancing, and acting shone brightly on stage.
meanings.sent5: The triune bond between the siblings was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A group of three in one.
meanings.sent1: The trio formed a triune to tackle the project together.
meanings.sent2: The triune of friends always had each other's backs.
meanings.sent3: The triune of puppies frolicked happily in the park.
meanings.sent4: The triune of stars in the sky twinkled brightly on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The triune of primary colors mixed to create a beautiful painting.
